law.catch_line: Limitation on right of ingress and egress for pipeline.
law.text: Where the pipeline is reasonably accessible over the easement sought to be condemned, ingress and egress to and from the pipeline and appurtenances shall be limited to the easement itself.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1952.
